members.name: dependent

constantValues: For some coverage a single identifier is issued to the Subscriber and a dependent number issued to each beneficiary.

members.description: For some coverage a single identifier is issued to the Subscriber and a dependent number issued to each beneficiary.

members.name: groupClass

constantValues: Identifies a style or collective of coverage issues by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a class of coverage such as a level of deductables or co-payment.

members.description: Identifies a style or collective of coverage issues by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a class of coverage such as a level of deductables or co-payment.

constantValues: A short description for the class.

members.description: A short description for the class.

members.name: groupDisplay

constantValues: A short description for the group.

members.description: A short description for the group.

members.name: groupPlan

constantValues: Identifies a style or collective of coverage issued by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a collection of benefits provided to employees. May be referred to as a Section or Division

members.description: Identifies a style or collective of coverage issued by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a collection of benefits provided to employees. May be referred to as a Section or Division

members.name: groupPlanDisplay

constantValues: A short description for the plan.

members.name: groupSubClass

constantValues: Identifies a sub-style or sub-collective of coverage issues by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a subclass of coverage such as a sub-level of deductables or co-payment.

members.name: groupSubPlan

constantValues: Identifies a sub-style or sub-collective of coverage issued by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a subset of a collection of benefits provided to employees.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field

members.name: network

constantValues: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' term

constantValues: The party who 'owns' the insurance policy, may be an individual, corporation or the subscriber's employer.

members.name: sequence

constantValues: An optional counter for a particular instance of the identified coverage which increments upon each renewal

members.description: An optional counter for a particular instance of the identified coverage which increments upon each renewal

constantValues: A short description for the subgroup.
